column1: Non_Frauds
Hello, this is your mobile service provider. We are calling to inform you about a new promotional offer for unlimited data plans. No sensitive information will be requested during this call.
Congratulations! You have been selected as a winner in a customer loyalty program. As a reward, you will receive a gift voucher in the mail. We just need to confirm your mailing address.
Good afternoon! This is a reminder from your local library regarding the upcoming due dates for borrowed books. Feel free to visit our website for more information.

Hello, this is the customer support team for your favorite online shopping platform. We noticed that you recently made a purchase and wanted to ensure your satisfaction. If you have any concerns, please let us know.

Thank you for being a valued customer of our cable TV services. We are calling to inform you about a new channel lineup that includes additional entertainment options. Enjoy your enhanced viewing experience!

Hello, this is the customer service department of your credit card company. We noticed a transaction on your account and wanted to confirm its authenticity. If you made the purchase, no action is required.

Good morning! This is your insurance provider calling to provide information about a new policy option that may better suit your needs. Take your time to review the details and contact us if interested.
Hello, this is the travel agency you recently booked a trip with. We are calling to provide you with additional details and confirm your travel itinerary. If you have any questions, feel free to ask.
Thank you for using our ride-sharing service. We noticed that you recently took a trip and wanted to thank you for choosing our platform. We appreciate your business!
Hello, this is your utility company calling to remind you about an upcoming scheduled maintenance in your area. There will be a temporary interruption in service, but it will be restored shortly.

Good afternoon! This is the customer support team for your favorite online streaming platform. We noticed that you experienced buffering issues and wanted to offer some troubleshooting tips to enhance your streaming experience.

Hello, this is the bank's customer service department. We wanted to inform you about a new savings account option that offers higher interest rates. If you're interested, we can provide more information.
Thank you for being a valued customer of our internet service. We are calling to inform you about an upgrade option that will provide faster internet speeds. Feel free to contact us for more details.
Good morning! This is your fitness center calling to remind you about your upcoming workout session with a personal trainer. We look forward to helping you reach your fitness goals.
Hello, this is your auto dealership reminding you about the scheduled maintenance for your vehicle. It's important to keep your car in good condition for optimal performance and safety.
Thank you for being a loyal customer of our restaurant. We are calling to inform you about our new menu items and special offers. We hope to see you soon!
Good afternoon! This is the customer support team for your preferred software provider. We noticed that you recently downloaded our application and wanted to ensure a smooth user experience.
Hello, this is your credit card company calling to inform you about a limited-time cashback promotion. Simply use your card for eligible purchases and earn cashback rewards.
Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. We are calling to provide you with exclusive updates and offers. If you wish to unsubscribe, please let us know.
Good morning! This is your healthcare provider calling to remind you about an upcoming appointment with your primary care physician. If you need to reschedule, please contact our office.
Hello, this is your favorite bookstore calling to let you know about our upcoming book signing event. You'll have the opportunity to meet a popular author. Save the date!
Thank you for being a valued customer of our home security services. We are calling to offer you an upgrade option with enhanced features for added peace of mind.
Good afternoon! This is your credit union calling to inform you about a special interest rate offer on personal loans. If you're interested in borrowing, we can provide more details.
Hello, this is your wireless provider calling to inform you about a network coverage expansion in your area. You can expect improved signal strength and better call quality.
Thank you for using our online ticketing service. We are calling to inform you about an upcoming concert in your city. Get ready for a memorable evening of music!
Good morning! This is your insurance agent calling to discuss your policy renewal. We want to ensure that your coverage aligns with your current needs and provide any necessary updates.
Hello, this is your favorite coffee shop calling to let you know about our new seasonal beverages. Treat yourself to a delightful cup of coffee or tea!
Thank you for being a loyal customer of our electronics store. We are calling to inform you about a special sale event where you can enjoy significant discounts on select products.
Good afternoon! This is the customer support team for your preferred mobile app. We noticed that you recently encountered an issue and wanted to assist you in resolving it.
Hello, this is the pet store where you recently made a purchase. We are calling to offer recommendations for pet care products and answer any questions you may have.
Thank you for being a valued customer of our home improvement store. We are calling to inform you about a flash sale where you can enjoy exclusive discounts on home renovation supplies.
Good morning! This is your cable internet provider calling to inform you about a speed upgrade option. Enjoy faster internet browsing and streaming with our enhanced package.
Hello, this is your dental office calling to remind you about your upcoming dental check-up. Regular dental visits are essential for maintaining oral health.
Thank you for being a loyal customer of our clothing store. We are calling to inform you about a customer appreciation event where you can enjoy exclusive discounts.
Good afternoon! This is the customer support team for your preferred gaming platform. We noticed that you recently encountered a technical issue and wanted to assist you in resolving it.
Hello, this is your preferred airline calling to inform you about a flash sale on domestic flights. Take advantage of discounted fares and plan your next getaway.
Thank you for being a valued customer of our pharmacy. We are calling to inform you about a prescription refill reminder service to ensure you never run out of medication.

Hello, this is your insurance provider calling to discuss a policy update that may result in lower premiums. We can review your coverage options and provide cost-saving recommendations.
Thank you for being a loyal customer of our grocery store. We are calling to inform you about a special promotion where you can earn loyalty points for future discounts.

Thank you for being a loyal customer of our online language learning platform. We are calling to recommend advanced language courses tailored to your learning goals. Take your language skills to the next level!

Thank you for being a valued customer of our online pet grooming service. We are calling to offer you a discount on your next pet grooming appointment. Keep your furry friend looking and feeling their best.

Businessman: Good morning, this is John from XYZ Corporation. We recently launched a new product and thought it might be of interest to your company.
Receiver: Oh, I see. Could you provide more details about the product?

Family Member: Hi, it's your cousin Lisa! How have you been?
Receiver: Oh, hey Lisa! I'm doing well, thanks. How about you?

Friend: Hey, it's Mike. What are you up to this weekend?
Receiver: Oh, hey Mike! I don't have any specific plans. Why?
Organization: Hello, this is the Red Cross. We're currently running a blood donation drive in your area. Would you be interested in donating?
Businessman: Good morning, this is Mark from ABC Enterprises. We noticed you recently inquired about our services. Is now a good time to discuss them?
Family Member: Hi, it's Aunt Carol! I wanted to invite you to your cousin's graduation party next month. Will you be able to make it?
Friend: Hey, it's Sarah. I heard there's a new café that opened up in town. Would you like to go try it out together?
Organization: Hi, this is the local library. We wanted to inform you about our upcoming book fair. Are you interested in attending?
Businessman: Hello, this is Robert from XYZ Bank. We're offering a special interest rate on our business loans. Would you like more information?
Family Member: Hi, it's your sister. I wanted to let you know that mom and dad are planning a family reunion next year. Save the date!
Friend: Hey, it's Alex. I found this great deal on vacation packages. Are you up for a trip to the beach this summer?
Organization: Hello, this is the Wildlife Conservation Society. We're seeking donations to support our efforts in protecting endangered species.
Businessman: Hi, this is David from ABC Insurance. I wanted to discuss our new policies that offer comprehensive coverage for businesses like yours.
Family Member: Hi, it's your uncle. We're having a barbecue this weekend. Can you bring some of your famous grilled chicken?
Friend: Hey, it's Emily. I just bought tickets to a comedy show. Would you like to join me for a night of laughter?
Organization: Hello, this is the local food bank. We're organizing a food drive to help families in need. Would you be interested in making a donation?
Businessman: Good afternoon, this is Robert from XYZ Consulting. We've reviewed your company's website and have some suggestions for improvement.
Family Member: Hi, it's your grandma. I wanted to check in and see how you're doing. Let's catch up soon!
Friend: Hey, it's Jason. I heard there's a new movie coming out. Shall we plan a movie night?
Organization: Hello, this is the charity organization for children's education. We wanted to update you on the progress of the project you supported.
Businessman: Hi, this is Sarah from ABC Solutions. We offer customized software development services. Are you looking to enhance your company's IT infrastructure?
Family Member: Hi, it's your brother. I found some old family photos. Let's get together and reminisce about the good times.
Friend: Hey, it's Jessica. There's a new art exhibition opening. Would you like to join me for the opening night?
Organization: Hello, this is the local animal shelter. We wanted to inform you about our upcoming adoption event. Are you considering adding a furry friend to your family?

Family Member: Hi, it's your cousin Mike! Long time no talk. How's everything going with you?
Friend: Hey, it's Rachel. I stumbled upon this great hiking trail. Would you like to go on an adventure with me?
